00030         std::auto_ptr<nothrow_integer> cZero, cOne, cNaN;

00034 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer() {
00035     _attach_0();
00036 }
00037 
00039 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const nothrow_integer& b) {
00040     try {
00041         if (!b.is_nan()) _attach(b);
00042     } catch (std::exception&) {
00043         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00057 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const integer& b) {
00058     try {
00059         _attach(b);
00060     } catch (std::exception&) {
00061         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00066 nothrow_integer::nothrow_integer(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00067     try {
00068         _attach(from_string(str, base));
00069     } catch (std::exception&) {
00070         // Do nothing, automatically sets to Not-a-Number
00071     }
00072 }
00073 
00078 bool nothrow_integer::odd() const {
00079     if (is_nan()) return false;
00080     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==1);
00081 }
00082 
00087 bool nothrow_integer::even() const {
00088     if (is_nan()) return false;
00089     return ((_get_digit(0) & 0x01)==0);
00090 }
00091 
00096 int nothrow_integer::sign(bool signed_zero) const {
00097     if (is_nan()) return 0;
00098     if (!signed_zero && _is_zero()) return 0;
00099     else return (_get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00100 }

00106 size_t nothrow_integer::hex_digits() const {
00107     try {
00108         return xint::nothrow_integer(*this).hex_digits();
00109     } catch (std::exception&) {
00110         return 0;
00111     }
00112 }

00120 bool nothrow_integer::is_nan() const {
00121     return _is_nan();
00122 }

00124 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator+=(const nothrow_integer& addend) {
00125     try {
00126         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator+=(xint::nothrow_integer(addend)));
00127     } catch (std::exception&) {
00128         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00129     }
00130     return *this;
00131 }

00133 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator-=(const nothrow_integer& subtrahend) {
00134     try {
00135         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator-=(xint::nothrow_integer(subtrahend)));
00136     } catch (std::exception&) {
00137         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00138     }
00139     return *this;

00142 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator=(const nothrow_integer &c) {
00143     try {
00144         _attach(c);
00145     } catch (std::exception&) {
00146         _attach(0);
00147     }
00148     return *this;
00149 }

00151 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator*=(const nothrow_integer& b) { *this=multiply(*this, b); return *this; }
00152 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator/=(const nothrow_integer& b) { *this=divide(*this, b); return *this; }
00153 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator%=(const nothrow_integer& b) { *this=mod(*this, b); return *this; }

00155 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator++() { *this += one(); return *this; }
00156 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator--() { *this -= one(); return *this; }
00157 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator++(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; *this += one(); return s; }
00158 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator--(int) { nothrow_integer s=*this; *this -= one(); return s; }

00160 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator<<(size_t shift) const { return shift_left(*this, shift); }
00161 nothrow_integer  nothrow_integer::operator>>(size_t shift) const { return shift_right(*this, shift); }
00162 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator&=(const nothrow_integer& n) { *this=bitwise_and(*this, n); return *this; }
00163 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator|=(const nothrow_integer& n) { *this=bitwise_or(*this, n); return *this; }
00164 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator^=(const nothrow_integer& n) { *this=bitwise_xor(*this, n); return *this; }

00166 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator<<=(size_t shift) {
00167     try {
00168         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator<<=(shift));
00169     } catch (std::exception&) {
00170         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00171     }
00172     return *this;

00175 nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::operator>>=(size_t shift) {
00176     try {
00177         *this=nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer(*this).operator>>=(shift));
00178     } catch (std::exception&) {
00179         *this=nothrow_integer::nan();
00180     }
00181     return *this;

00184 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::zero() {
00185     if (cZero.get()==0) cZero.reset(new nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer::zero()));
00186     return *cZero;
00187 }
00188 
00189 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::one() {
00190     if (cOne.get()==0) cOne.reset(new nothrow_integer(xint::nothrow_integer::one()));
00191     return *cOne;
00192 }
00193 
00194 const nothrow_integer& nothrow_integer::nan() {
00195     if (cNaN.get()==0) {
00196         nothrow_integer *n=new nothrow_integer();
00197         n->_attach(0);
00198         cNaN.reset(n);
00199     }
00200     return *cNaN;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void nothrow_integer::_make_unique() {
00204     try {
00205         _base_make_unique();
00206     } catch (std::exception&) {
00207         _attach(0); // Turns it into a Not-a-Number.
00208     }
00209 }
